definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Cilicia is now part of the country of Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 西里西亞是今天土耳其的一部分。

sentences.english: High unemployment and environmental devastation are the most serious problems facing Upper Silesia today.
sentences.chinese: 高失業率和環境惡化已成爲上西里西亞嚴峻社會問題。

sentences.english: We saw equal quantities of tanks and SPG's in Silesia.
sentences.chinese: 在西里西亞我們看到的坦克和自行火炮一樣多。
